page.title: 04HORSE BREEDING(COLLEGE BARN)
page.content: College Barn is a horse breeders. The main breeds of horse are part bred Anglo Arabs.The business has only been going for 2 years although horses have been bred there for 20 years. The building dates from about 1400. All the beams in the house were floated up the river and all bricks were hand made.It is thought that they are the oldest bricks in Great Finborough. It is obvious that the house was built before fireplaces and windows were invented.All the windows have shutters and the rafters in the roof are black because of fires that were made in the middle of rooms. With the house there are 31 acres of mostly pasture land.The horses are mainly for showing but there are some hacks and hunters.
